data.name: APPS_ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS
data.value: Support only documents in pdf, png, jpg and file sizes must not over 5 MB

data.name: APPS_DESCRIPTION
data.value:
• Employer with at least 1 or more employees must register the employer registration and employee registration as insured person within 30 days. When employer increases more employees, must register new employee within 30 days as well.
  • Insured Person is employees at least 15 years old and not over 60 years old (in the first date of work) and work in place of business that have at least 1 employee.
  • Contribution fund is money that employer and employee must send to social security fund every month calculating from wage that employee earns. This wage is set from monthly wage which is minimum 1650 baht and maximum 15,000 baht. Government also gives some contribution money to social security fund.

data.name: APPS_DOC_CitizenCard
data.value: สําเนาหรือภาพถ๋ายบัตรประจําตัวประชาชน (คนต่างด้าวใช้สําเนาหนังสือเดินทางหรือใบสําคัญประจำตัวคนต่างด้าว)

data.name: APPS_DOC_CitizenCard_DESC
data.value: สําเนาหรือภาพถ๋ายบัตรประจําตัวประชาชน (คนต่างด้าวใช้สําเนาหนังสือเดินทางหรือใบสําคัญประจำตัวคนต่างด้าว)

data.name: APPS_DOC_Contract
data.value: Copy of rental agreement

data.name: APPS_DOC_Contract_DESC
data.value: Copy of rental agreement or approval letter of the use of place together with a copy of identification card and a copy of house registration of the lessor or retail lease agreement or evidences for indicating lock number and the location of market or department store.

data.name: APPS_DOC_EmployerDoc
data.value: The evidences to indicate the self of employer

data.name: APPS_DOC_EmployerDoc_DESC
data.value: The evidences to indicate the self of employer as a copy of identification card or a copy of house registration of employer or the committee who has authority to sign (in the case that the committee is foreigner, passport or work permit or visa has to be provided) (for an alien, a copy of passport or a copy of certificate of alien has to be provided) or a copy certificate of residence or an evidence of a non-immigrant status according to immigration act.

data.name: APPS_DOC_Map
data.value: Location map and photograph of the company

data.name: APPS_DOC_Map_DESC
data.value: Location map and photograph of the company.

data.name: APPS_DOC_PowerOfAttorney
data.value: Letter of power of attorney

data.name: APPS_DOC_PowerOfAttorney_DESC
data.value: Letter of power of attorney (in the case that providing power of attorney to the entrusted person and has to attach stamp duty which is revenue code) with the copies of identification card of the grantor and the entrusted persons.

data.name: APPS_DOC_RegistrationBook
data.value: สําเนาหรือภาพถ่ายทะเบียนบ้าน

data.name: APPS_DOC_RegistrationBook_DESC
data.value: สําเนาหรือภาพถ่ายทะเบียนบ้าน

data.name: APPS_DOC_RegistrationForm
data.value: Employer registration form (Sor.Por.Sor. 1-01)

data.name: APPS_DOC_RegistrationForm_DESC
data.value:
Employer registration form (Sor.Por.Sor. 1-01)
(In the case that there is not enough space in the forms number 2, number 3.2 and number 6, the other papers should be used to complete all the information. Then, save the file and upload the document.)

data.name: APPS_DOC_RegistrationJuristic
data.value: Copy of certificate of juristic person registration with objective

data.name: APPS_DOC_RegistrationJuristic_DESC
data.value: Copy of certificate of juristic person registration with objective or copy of commercial registration certificate or certificate in accordance with the foreign business act, B.E.2542 (1999) or copy of joint venture agreement or copy of certificate or evidence of juristic person status that indicates the list about name, fund, objective, committee names who have authority to bind the entity as well as the notice of appointment of representatives which is appointed by the authorized person to bind the entity of employer registration to be responsible for operating business in Thailand or business licenses that issued in accordance with other laws.

data.name: APPS_DOC_RegistrationPersonalVat
data.value: สำเนาหรือภาพถ่าย บัตรประจำตัวผู้เสียภาษีอากร/ร.ง. 4/ภ.พ.20/ภ.ธ. 20

data.name: APPS_DOC_RegistrationPersonalVat_DESC
data.value: สําเนาบัตรประจำตัวผู้เสียภาษีอากร หรือสําเนาภาพถ่ายใบอนุญาตประกอบกิจการโรงงาน (ร.ง. 4) หรือสําเนาหรือภาพถ่ายใบทะเบียนภาษีมูลคาเพิ่ม (ภ.พ.20) หรือสําเนาภาพถ่ายภาษีธุรกิจเฉพาะ (ภ.ธ. 20)

data.name: APPS_DOC_RegistrationVat
data.value: Copy of the taxpayer identification number

data.name: APPS_DOC_RegistrationVat_DESC
data.value: Copy of the taxpayer identification number or copy of value added tax registration (Por. Por. 01) or copy of special business tax registration (Por Tor 20) or foreign business license.

data.value: Employer Registration

data.name: APPS_STEPS
data.value: Employer registration procedures

data.name: APPS_STEP_1
data.value: Fill in and send advance employer registration form via internet

data.name: APPS_STEP_1_DL
data.value: [download employer registration form]

data.name: APPS_STEP_1_DL_EX
data.value: [example of filling in employer registration form]

data.name: APPS_STEP_2
data.value: Upload employer registration and related document

data.name: APPS_STEP_2_PANEL_HEADER
data.value: Upload employer registration form and other related documents

data.name: APPS_STEP_2_REMARK
data.value: Noted: * Document is required.

data.name: APPS_STEP_3
data.value: Check for the completion of document

data.name: APPS_STEP_3_PANEL_HEADER
data.value: Check the document

data.name: APPS_STEP_3_REMARK
data.value:
Noted: After receiving an approval, the account number has to be informed when contacting the Social Security Office. The further information is as follow:

  1. Compensation Fund: provide to an employee who is injured, sick or dead because of work. The employer has to pay the subsidy once a year. Employee compensation form (Kor Tor 26 Kor) will be sent to the registered email after receiving an approval or see on [tracking]. The payment should be made via Krungthai Bank, Krungsri Bank, Thanachart Bank and counter services within 30 days. If the payment is made after the due date, the payment will be multiplied by 3 percent per month. For the other years, the payment should be made within January.

  2. Social Security Fund: provide to an insured person who is injured, sick or dead not because of work, childbirth, child welfare, senescence and unemployed. The employer has to deduct five percent of an employee’s wage which is defined from the wage base, not less than 1,650 Baht and not over 15,000 Baht. The employer has to subsidy the money which is equal to total amount of the deduction from the employee as follows:

    1. Submit social security contribution return form (Sor Por Sor 1-10 Part 1 and Part 2) [download form Sor Por Sor 1-10 Part 1 and Part 2] and the report of submission of contributions in the case that the employer delivers the contribution with the branches (Sor Por Sor 1-10/1) [download form Sor Por Sor 1-10/1] within 15 days of the next month.

    2. Deliver the contribution via e-service [e-service]

    3. • Deliver the contribution via Krungthai Bank, Krungsri Bank, Thanachart Bank or via e-payment of Krungsri Bank, Citibank, Mizuho Bank, Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation, The Siam Commercial Bank, Krungthai Bank and Kasikorn Bank. If the contribution is delivered after the due date, the payment will be multiplied by 2 percent per month. [Channels of delivering Social Contribution Fund]

For contacting Social Security Office, please contact at [contact Social Security Office]
